goal.en: Through this course, we anticipate that the students can obtain the basic knowledge of physical concepts, and the students can use these basic concepts along with elementary mathematics and logical arguments in the analysis of a physics phenomenon.
goal.ch: 讓學生對於基礎物理有初步的認識, 並能運用所學過的數學及邏輯探討來分析物理問題

content.en:
Electromagnetism:
- electric field and potential; Coulomb‘s law; Gauss‘s law
- capacitance; RC circuits; energy in electric field
- static magnetism; Lorentz-force law; Biot-Savart law
- electromagnetic induction and Faraday‘s law; inductance, magnetic energy
- LC and RLC circuits
- Maxwell‘s equations; electromagnetic waves
Optics: single- and double-slit interference; optical gratings
Introduction to special relativity

flex_desc.en: We will try to use a rather condensed version of syllabus and finish our lectures before the end of the 16th week.  If there happens to be a delay, we will give makeup lectures in the 17th and 18th weeks, if needed.  The final exam will be arranged before the end of the 16th week.
flex_desc.ch: 我們會試圖將18周的課程內容精簡在16周的時程內講授完畢. 如果有不可抗力之因素導致授課進度延誤, 將會視情況在17及18周補課, 但考試仍會安排在16周結束前.
